feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Logging
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Logging

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the [Cloud SDK](https://cloud.google.com/sdk).
### Java
### Changes for [google-cloud-logging](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging)
#### [3.23.0](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/compare/v3.22.6...v3.23.0) (2025-07-11)
##### Features
* Next release from main branch is 3.23.0 ([#1826](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/issues/1826)) ([f0ef15f](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/commit/f0ef15f609a3400460bd8074bdd05014cc388743))
##### Dependencies
* Update dependency com.google.cloud:sdk-platform-java-config to v3.50.1 ([#1828](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/issues/1828)) ([44c3094](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/commit/44c3094e23450f1a8e6bb397f209b17cf37a4345))
entry.summary: This is a weekly digest of client library updates for Java, including new features and dependency updates for google-cloud-logging.
entry.title: Libraries: Java Client Library Updates

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the [Cloud SDK](https://cloud.google.com/sdk).
### Java
### Changes for [google-cloud-logging](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging)
#### [3.22.6](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/compare/v3.22.5...v3.22.6) (2025-06-25)
##### Bug Fixes
* Regenerate gapic yaml and service yaml for logging by augmentation configs ([9023895](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/commit/9023895fd56381c1f4309843a269975763a89d40))
##### Dependencies
* Update dependency com.google.cloud:sdk-platform-java-config to v3.50.0 ([#1821](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/issues/1821)) ([af4edc5](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/commit/af4edc5b1399b3563d9cf07e171c4281fde2bb79)) * Update googleapis/sdk-platform-java action to v2.60.0 ([#1822](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/issues/1822)) ([0a96dd5](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/commit/0a96dd52dc1594767b7dd60da99a17bac8ac14ba))
entry.summary: This is a weekly digest of client library updates, including bug fixes and dependency updates for the Java client library for Google Cloud Logging.
entry.title: Libraries: Java Client Library Updates

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the [Cloud SDK](https://cloud.google.com/sdk).
### Java
### Changes for [google-cloud-logging](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging)
#### [3.22.5](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/compare/v3.22.4...v3.22.5) (2025-06-05)
##### Bug Fixes
* **deps:** Update the Java code generator (gapic-generator-java) to 2.59.0 ([f2362fb](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/commit/f2362fb4c05d34fda4a1c9788ea87822ac887d9e))
##### Dependencies
* Update dependency com.google.cloud:sdk-platform-java-config to v3.49.0 ([#1813](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/issues/1813)) ([c15da84](https://github.com/googleapis/java-logging/commit/c15da84716d6d554ae26919412e8d4313fd980bc))
entry.summary: This release includes updates to the Java client library for Cloud Logging, specifically version 3.22.5. Key changes involve bug fixes, including an update to the Java code generator, and dependency updates.
entry.title: Libraries: Java client library for Cloud Logging updated

entry.content: Cloud Logging begins enforcement of the new volume-based regional quotas. For more information, see [Logging API quotas and limits](https://cloud.google.com/logging/quotas#api-limits).
entry.summary: Cloud Logging will start enforcing new regional quotas based on volume. For more details, please refer to the Logging API quotas and limits documentation.
entry.title: Announcement: Cloud Logging Enforces New Volume-Based Quotas

entry.content: You can now cancel a running query in the Logs Explorer by clicking the **Stop query** button.
entry.summary: You can now cancel a running query in the Logs Explorer by clicking the "Stop query" button.
entry.title: Feature: Stop query button in Logs Explorer

entry.content: You can now configure the observability scope or set the default log scope by using the Google Cloud CLI. You must use version 254.0 or higher. For more information, see [Configure observability scopes](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/scopes/configure) and [Set the default log scope](https://cloud.google.com/logging/docs/log-scope/create-and-manage#set-default).
entry.summary: You can now set the default log scope or configure the observability scope using the Google Cloud CLI with version 254.0 or higher. For more details, refer to the documentation on configuring observability scopes and setting the default log scope.
entry.title: Feature: Google Cloud CLI now supports observability and log scopes
